gobblin.compaction.dataset

Class DatasetHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.compaction.dataset.DatasetHelper

  • public class DatasetHelper
extends Object
    A class DatasetHelper which provides runtime metrics and other helper functions for a given dataset. The class also contains different recompaction conditions RecompactionCondition, which indicates if a recompaction is needed. These conditions will be examined by MRCompactorJobRunner after late data was found and copied from inputDir to outputLateDir.
